resources.string: Thank you for the download!\nStart right now getting\n info about Corona Virus
If you are feeling sick, please call Covid Hotline or try to book online consultation with a doctor.

Hello! I\'m Damiano and I\'m from Ivrea, a small town in Piedmont where the Olivetti company was born, grew up and died. I\'m 22 years old and I\'m in my first year of the Master\'s degree: Artificial Intelligence at the University of Turin. I know and have used the following programming languages: C, Java, Kotlin, Haskell, Python. I am here thanks to the Erasmus+ program for the summer semester and I was impressed by the greatness of the Polytechnic and the beauty of Wroclaw. \n\n Hey, My name is Piotr, I\'m from central Poland and I study on Wroclaw University of Science and Technology. I\'m 24 years old and I plan to get my Master\'s degree of Applied Computer Science next year. I work as Test Automation Engineer and I\'m interested in software development.
